name: HousingCard-dsasn-1703823789878

description.user: airbnb housing card, with some minor information
description.llm: Create a Vue component named 'HousingCard', inspired by Airbnb's housing cards, which display minor information about short-term rental properties. The component should have a visually appealing and intuitive design, encapsulating property details such as an image (via avatar or aspect-ratio), title, room details, price, rating (using badge or progress), and a button to allow users to learn more or book the property. It should be responsive and easily integrable on various pages of a web application.

components.name: card
components.usage: To provide a structured layout, resembling a housing card, with a header, content, and footer sections.

components.name: avatar
components.usage: To display the image of the property in a user-friendly and familiar format.

components.name: badge
components.usage: To represent property ratings or any special status, as it is highly visible and distinct.

components.name: button
components.usage: To allow users to interact with the card, such as navigating to a detailed view of the property or booking it.

components.name: tooltip
components.usage: To provide additional information about the property or features without cluttering the main view.
